definitions.text: talk socially without exchanging too much information
examples: the men were sitting in the cafe and shooting the breeze

definitions.text: chew (food); to bite and grind with the teeth
examples: Chew your food and don't swallow it!
The cows were masticating the grass
The mother scolded the child for entering a stranger's car
The deputy ragged the Prime Minister
The customer dressed down the waiter for bringing cold soup

definitions.text: of animals having jaws of a specified type
